name: Soldier 1945
description:
Play as a soldier in a war video game during world war 2 with the following exciting features:

- Varied game environments (forest, underground, and many more).
- Varied changeable weapons.
- Challenging and addictive game levels.
- Challenging enemy's AI.
- Great war sound effects and music.
- Auto saving of completed levels.
- Support more iOS devices and easier to play.
